name: Domain Machinery
desc: Making extensive use of Domain-grade machinery, it can largely take care of itself and will always be recoverable after combat. Safety Overrides and similar modifications are incompatible.

name: Time Accelerator
desc: Using salvaged systems from high tech unknown entities, supplemental ship systems increase timeflow during combat situations by %s.

name: Integrated Nanoforge
desc:
Ship systems have been modified with a corrupted nanoforge, moderately assisting in field production of ammo. 

Ammo/charge generation for ballistic and missile weapons is increased by %s.
short: Increases ammo/charge regeneration for ballistic and missile weapons.

name: Integrated Pristine Nanoforge
desc:
Ship systems have been modified with a pristine nanoforge, assisting in field production of ammo. 

Ammo/charge generation for ballistic and missile weapons is increased by %s and every %s seconds %s of ammo will be replenished for those that donâ€™t replenish themselves naturally.
short: Increases ammo/charge regeneration for ballistic and missile weapons, those without innate regeneration will be slowly restored.

name: Integrated Tap
desc:
Ship systems have been modified with a hypershunt tap, allowing the ship to store excess energy and heat. 

Ammo/charge generation for energy weapons is increased by %s and magazine capacity by %s. Flux capacity increased by %s/%s/%s/%s, depending on hull size.
short: Increases ammo/charge regeneration and capacity for energy weapons as well as flux capacity.
